SELECT * FROM SYS_MENU where name like '%'||#{map.search}||'%'
and pid = #{map.group}
and pid = '0'
order by sort
select a.* from SYS_MENU a where pid = '0' and id > '0' order by sort
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO SYS_MENU S USING DUAL ON (S.ID = #{id} and S.PID = #{pid}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET S.name = #{name} , S.SORT = #{sort} , S.URL = nvl(#{url},' ') WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (S.id, S.PID, S.NAME, S.SORT, S.URL) VALUES (#{id},#{pid},#{name},#{sort},nvl(#{url},''))
